title: Bug 15899 - Close all saved does not work consistently
description: When attempting to use the 'Close all saved' feature, it sometimes fails to close all the files that have been saved. This issue occurs even when no changes have been made to the files.
OB: Sometimes 'Close all saved' fails to close all saved files, even when no changes have been made.
EB: The 'Close all saved' feature should close all saved files, regardless of whether any changes have been made.
SR:
1. Open multiple files in the application.
2. Save all the opened files without making any changes.
3. Click on the 'Close all saved' feature.
4. Verify if all saved files are closed successfully, without any remaining open files.
